about: I am a Postdoctoral Researcher at the University of Texas Southwestern working at the intersection of Computer Vision, Generative Modeling, and Machine Learning. My work involves developing domain-informed AI frameworks for healthcare, such as MRI variance stabilization and diffusion denoising, as well as advanced manufacturing applications involving unlabeled data and class imbalance. I am seeking career opportunities that integrate AI, data science, and domain expertise to create robust and scalable systems for real-world healthcare challenges.
